doc:
Virginia Pearson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virginia_Pearson 0 Virginia Belle Pearson (March 7, 1886 – June 6, 1958) was an American stage and film actress. She made fifty-one films in a career which extended from 1910 until 1932. Virginia_Belle_Pearson ( March_7_,_1886 – June_6_,_1958 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actress . She made fifty-one_films in a_career which extended from 1910 until 1932 .
